frontmatter.title: IBM Design system - UX Patterns
frontmatter.description: A description of the UX patterns I have contributed to IBM's design system - Carbon.

internal.content:
---
title: IBM Design system - UX Patterns
description: A description of the UX patterns I have contributed to IBM's design system - Carbon. 
---

<PageDescription>
    IBM's unified, open source design language is called Carbon, and can be used by anyone. 
    It's a key method IBM is using to align a huge number and range of user experiences.
    However, we realised that there is more to a consistent experience than colour, components, font, style and illustrations. 
    As such, I've been involved in designing several UX patterns for common user flows or actions. 
    These patterns are now in use by product teams all over IBM.
</PageDescription>

description: A description of the UX patterns I have contributed to IBM's design system - Carbon. 
---

<PageDescription>
    IBM's unified, open source design language is called Carbon, and can be used by anyone. 
    It's a key method IBM is using to align a huge number and range of user experiences.
    However, we realised that there is more to a consistent experience than colour, components, font, style and illustrations. 
    As such, I've been involved in designing several UX patterns for common user flows or actions. 
    These patterns are now in use by product teams all over IBM.
